name: Hammer Time! (Rainy Elephant Studios)
description:
If you have issues with mouse sensitivity or performance, download the game and play it

If you are playing on a browser, hit the full screen button at the bottom right. Otherwise the game will be cropped.

Do you like smashing things with hammers? Who doesn't!? Smash away in this retro-inspired 3D hammer game! Can you beat the high score?

Be sure to read the guide below for help.

How to Play Controls

Movement: WASD

Hammer: Left Mouse

Grappling Line: Right Mouse

Pause: Esc/P

Gameplay

You need to wipe out all the enemies to clear each wave. If enemies touch you, you take damage.

Glowblobs (Blue Enemy) 🔵

Glowblobs will explode when they contact the ground or an enemy after you hit them. You can use their explosions to kill other enemies too!

The game will always spawn one more if there are none. Don't worry, their explosions won't harm you. 

Maddads (Red Enemy) 🔴

There are multiple ways to kill a maddad. You can use a glowblob explosion, hit them while they are in the air, or hit them at high speeds!

Hitting a maddad in air

Using the momentum from a grapple to launch a maddad

Flumpkins (Purple Enemy) 🟣

Flumpkins are the older brothers of the group, and require 3 hits from a Glowblob to kill! They appear every 3 waves.

Upgrades 🛠

Upgrades people, upgrades

Every 2 waves, you can upgrade your character! Upgrades include:  Refill Health, Max Health +1, Bigger Hammer (my favorite), Jumps +1, Speed +1, Jump Height +1

Upgrades stack infinitely.

Hammer Angles 🔨

The angle at which you hit an enemy determines its direction. If you hit a glowblob from above, you can even detonate it right where it stands!

Crosshair ➕

The crosshair will turn yellow when you can grapple to somewhere, and green when you can hit it with your hammer.
